email.subject: Case File: SC-9 - Termination
email.body:
What?! How did he know about us?! This is bad. Nova was meant to be kept secret, even from most of the government. It seems this was just one step in a greater plan to expose Nova's activities to the world. This is something that absolutely cannot happen under any circumstances. And Mahler... I know that name. That bastard must've planned things from the very beginning. You had better lay low for a while, operative. I do not want you getting involved in this under any circumstances. Are you understood? This will be the last time you hear from us for a while. At least until we manage to sort this situation out on our end.
- H
